safeAreaInsetTop.description: Whether to enable top security zone adaptation
safeAreaInsetTop.description_zh: 是否开启顶部安全区适配

placeholder.description: When fixed to the top, whether to generate a contour element to prevent collapse
placeholder.description_zh: 固定在顶部时，是否生成一个等高元素，以防止塌陷

fixed.description: Whether the navigation bar is pinned to the top
fixed.description_zh: 导航栏是否固定在顶部

border.description: Whether the bottom border appears at the bottom of the navigation bar
border.description_zh: 导航栏底部是否显示下边框

leftIcon.description: The name of the icon on the left can only be the icon that comes with uView
leftIcon.description_zh: 左边返回图标的名称，只能为uView自带的图标

rightIcon.description: The name of the returned icon on the right can only be the icon that comes with uView
rightIcon.description_zh: 右边返回图标的名称，只能为uView自带的图标

title.description: The navigation bar title, if set to a null character, will hide the title placeholder area
title.description_zh: 导航栏标题，如设置为空字符，将会隐藏标题占位区域

titleWidth.description: The maximum width of the navigation bar header, the content exceeds will be hidden by an ellipsis, in rpx
titleWidth.description_zh: 导航栏标题的最大宽度，内容超出会以省略号隐藏，单位rpx

height.description: The height of the navigation bar (excluding the height of the status bar, which is automatically added internally) in px
height.description_zh: 导航栏高度(不包括状态栏高度在内，内部自动加上)，单位px

leftIconSize.description: The left side returns the size of the icon

leftIconColor.description: The color of the return icon on the left

autoBack.description: Click on the left area (back icon) to automatically return to the previous page
autoBack.description_zh: 点击左侧区域(返回图标)，是否自动返回上一页

titleStyle.description: The style, object or string form of the title
titleStyle.description_zh: 标题的样式，对象或字符串形式

events.name: leftClick
events.description: Click the area on the left

events.name: rightClick
events.description: Click on the area on the right

slots.name: left
slots.description: Customize the left part of the content

slots.name: right
slots.description: Customize the right part of the content
